column5: I must say i got the most bestest present from my wife this morning ever, One that took alot of thought and something she new i would love, where she got it i have no idea, have never seen one before, but i just love it and i'll have it always, every year i don't get much fishing related presents, like most i pick up what i need when needed, but this one is something i really love as well as her after being together for 16 years, check this out..... BEST GIFT EVERRRRRRRRR!!!
Thats a great and thoughtful gift walleyeman.  Merry Christmas to you and family.
I like that it has little sub headings and titles where you can "fill in the blanks". Very great gift indeed!

you will have a blast trying to fill that in..there's tonnes of pages in it, and you will be surprized what info you can gather for yourself along the way..it's a great learning tool...my wife got me one a couple years ago
ya i like that! thats a hand me down later in life.
thats cool,and so true  Hawg Hunter
My thoughts exactly guyz,something that could be passed down to my boyz and grandkids in the future, kinda like the little black book of fishing LOL!
Great idea! Went to the website and think I will get one. Thank you for posting this......very cool  D
My g/f picked me up that same journal a couple years ago, I always enjoy reading over it when I cant hit the water
